yn_question_list: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
Is there a gorgeous metallic vinyl record player in the image?
Is there a smaller, older metallic vinyl record player in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: one vinyl record player is gorgeous, while the other is smaller and older?
Is the gorgeous vinyl record player metallic?
Is the smaller, older vinyl record player metallic?
Is there a woman in a fluffy outfit in the image?
Is there a group of people wearing metallic hoodies in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: a woman not wearing a hoodie stands out amidst people wearing hoodies?
Is the outfit of the woman made of fluffy material?
Are the hoodies worn by people made of metallic material?
Is there a house cat with a leather collar in the image?
Is there a feral cat in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: a house cat lounges in the sunlight, while a feral cat sits in the shadows?
Is the collar made of leather?
Is the surface where the feral cat sits made of plastic?
